skills.skill: DCS, PLC, HMI, and SCADA Systems
Industry Standards and Protocols (OPC, Modbus, Profibus)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, implement, and maintain control systems for industrial processes in the Chemical and Oil & Gas sector.
Ensure the efficiency, safety, and optimization of production processes.
Program and troubleshoot AllenBradley ControlLogix systems and other programming languages such as PLC ladder logic, Function Block Diagrams (FBD), and Structured Text (ST).
Utilize hands-on experience with DCS, PLC, HMI, and SCADA systems as well as Gas Treatment Facilities.
Analyze and optimize industry standards and protocols such as OPC, Modbus, and Profibus.
Collaborate with multiple stakeholders and work effectively in a team environment.
Convey technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Control Systems Engineering, Chemical Engineering, or a related field (Master's degree preferred)
